data.name: The Loop Loft - Doug Wamble Jazz, Blues, & Soul
data.detailed_description:
All content included is royalty-free

In Doug Wamble's (Wynton Marsalis, Norah Jones) third Artist Series release, Jazz, Blues and Soul, he delivers an astonishing array of guitar parts, drawing inspiration from six string greats like Joe Pass, Wes Montgomery, Kenny Burrell and Grant Green.

With a massive selection of lead lines, chordal grooves, tempos and keys (all 12 are covered), The Jazz, Blues and Soul collection will give you instant access to an endless amount of guitar parts steeped in tradition and true to the art form.

  • Additional Notes: Requires Music Creator 6 Touch, SONAR X3 or any DAW that supports REX files
